title: The North Star - function of concluding stanza

content.question: The concluding stanza functions primarily to

choices.label: associate the brilliance of truth with the light of liberty
present a request for natureâ€™s help in human affairs
emphasize the need for political action, given the situation dramatized earlier in the poem
establish a similarity between the abolitionist newspaper and the celestial North Star

content.answer: establish a similarity between the abolitionist newspaper and the celestial North Star

skill.text: Skill 6.B: Identify and explain the function of a metaphor.
